TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StringDictionary extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("System.Diagnostics.Design.StringDictionaryCodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: Implements a hash table with the key and the value strongly typed to be strings rather than objects.

span.span: Implements a hash table with the key and the value strongly typed to be strings rather than objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 金鑰不能`null`，但是值可以。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can. 索引鍵被處理不區分大小寫的方式;使用與字串字典之前，它就會轉譯成小寫。The key is handled in a case-insensitive manner; it is translated to lowercase before it is used with the string dictionary. 在.NET Framework 1.0 版，這個類別會使用區分文化特性的字串比較。In .NET Framework version 1.0, this class uses culture-sensitive string comparisons. 不過，在.NET Framework 1.1 和更新版本中，這個類別會使用比較字串時。However, in .NET Framework version 1.1 and later, this class uses when comparing strings. 如需文化特性如何影響比較和排序的詳細資訊，請參閱[執行不區分文化特性的字串作業](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md)。For more information about how culture affects comparisons and sorting, see [Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾個屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . [!code-cpp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/CPP/stringdictionary.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/CS/stringdictionary.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/VB/stringdictionary.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 (在 Visual Basic 中) 這種類型的成員都具備執行緒安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此實作不會提供同步處理 （安全執行緒） 包裝函式，但在衍生的類別可以建立自己的同步的版本使用屬性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定的值比較的值項目的 StringDictionary方法。The values of the elements of the StringDictionary are compared to the specified value using the method. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間是成比例。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 也就是說，這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用集合的物件和方法`item`來判斷是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷和方法`item`參數集合中的物件。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例中的項目會搜尋。The following code example searches for an element in a . span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the string dictionary.

returns.span: An that iterates through the string dictionary.

span.span: An that iterates through the string dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列舉項目。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . [!code-cpp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration/CPP/stringdictionary_enumeration.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration/CS/stringdictionary_enumeration.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration/VB/stringdictionary_enumeration.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A未同步處理執行個體。A instance is not synchronized. 在衍生的類別可以提供的同步化的版本使用屬性。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/VB/source2.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵被處理不區分大小寫的方式;在使用前，它就會轉譯成小寫。The key is handled in a case-insensitive manner; it is translated to lowercase before it is used. 金鑰不能`null`，但是值可以。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can. 若要在區別`null`傳回因為找不到指定的索引鍵和`null`傳回指定之索引鍵的值，所以`null`，使用方法來判斷是否索引鍵存在於清單中。To distinguish between `null` that is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` that is returned because the value of the specified key is `null`, use the method to determine if the key exists in the list. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 擷取這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。設定屬性，也是一種 o （1） 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列舉項目。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的索引鍵的順序並未指定，但它是關聯值中的相同順序傳回方法。The order of the keys in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the returned by the method. 傳回不是靜態的複本; 相反地，中原始的索引鍵是指回。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original . 因此，變更為才會反映在繼續。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列舉項目。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . summary.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the string dictionary.

span.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the string dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不包含具有指定之索引鍵項目維持不變。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. 索引鍵被處理不區分大小寫的方式;它用來尋找要從字串字典中移除的項目之前，它就會轉譯成小寫。The key is handled in a case-insensitive manner; it is translated to lowercase before it is used to find the entry to remove from the string dictionary. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加入和移除項目從。The following code example demonstrates how to add and remove elements from a . [!code-cpp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_AddRemove/CPP/stringdictionary_addremove.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_AddRemove/CS/stringdictionary_addremove.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_AddRemove/VB/stringdictionary_addremove.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: ，可用於同步處理 的存取。

span.span: An that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業的、 直接依據。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改的執行緒物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/VB/source2.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
